main_definition: Winning refers to achieving victory or success in various contexts, such as games, competitions, personal goals, etc.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Success in a competition or contest
meanings_and_examples.example: The team's winning goal secured their place in the finals.
After years of hard work, she achieved her dream and emerged as a winner in her field.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Becoming more popular or gaining approval from others
meanings_and_examples.example: His winning personality made him well-liked by everyone at the party.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Achieving a desired outcome in life
meanings_and_examples.example: She won the lottery, which allowed her to fulfill all her dreams and desires.
